AdditionalPermissions.message: Permisos adicionais para sitios de confianza

AdditionalRestrictions.message: Restricións adicionais para sitio non de confianza

AllowClipboard.message: Permitir copiar e pegar texto desde un portapapeis externo

AlwaysBlockUntrustedContent.message: Block every object coming from a site marked as untrusted

AutoAllowTopLevel.message: Temporarily allow top-level sites by default

AutoReload.message: Recargar automaticamente as páxinas afectadas cando os permisos cambien

BookmarkSync.message: Backup NoScript configuration in a bookmark for easy synchronization

ClearClickDescription.message: NoScript intercepted a mouse or keyboard interaction with a partially hidden element. Click on the image above to cycle beetween the obstructed and the clear version.

ConfirmUnblock.message: Pedir confirmación antes de desblocar temporalmente un obxecto

ContentBlocker.message: Apply these restrictions to trusted sites too

Description.message: Extra protection for your Firefox: NoScript allows JavaScript, Flash (and other plugins) only for trusted domains of your choice (e.g. your home-banking web site). This whitelist based pre-emptive blocking approach prevents exploitation of security vulnerabilities (known and even unknown!) with no loss of functionality... Experts will agree: Firefox is really safer with NoScript :-)

ForbidMetaRefresh.message: Non permitir redireccións META dentro de elementos <NOSCRIPT>

FrameOptErr.desc.message: To protect your security, the publisher of this content does not allow it to be displayed in a frame.

FrameOptErr.link.message: Click here to open this content in a new window

FrameOptErr.title.message: This content cannot be displayed in a frame

Https.description.message: Forbid active web content unless it comes from a secure (HTTPS) connection:

Https.proxy.message: When using a proxy (recommended with Tor)

HttpsForced.message: Force the following sites to use secure (HTTPS) connections:

HttpsForcedExceptions.message: Never force secure (HTTPS) connections for the following sites:

NoUntrustedPlaceholder.message: No placeholder for objects coming from sites marked as untrusted

Notify.message: Amosar mensaxes sobre os scripts bloqueados

NselForce.message: Amosar o elemento <NOSCRIPT> que siga a un <SCRIPT> blocado

OptFilterXPost.message: Turn cross-site POST requests into data-less GET requests

PermissionsText.message: Podes especificar que páxinas web poden executar scripts. Teclea o enderezo ou o dominio (por exemplo "http://www.paxina.com" ou "paxina.com") do sitio que queres autorizar e despois preme en "Permitir".

ReloadWarn.message: Estas opcións terán efecto en páxinas novas ou (manualmente) recargadas

SecureCookiesExceptions.message: Ignore unsafe cookies set over HTTPS by the following sites:

SecureCookiesForced.message: Force encryption for all the cookies set over HTTPS by the following sites:

ToolbarToggle.message: Clic esquerdo no barra NoScript cambia permisos para a páxina actual

XssExceptions.description.message: Os destinos que coincidan con estas expresións regulares NON serán protexidos contra XSS

bookmarkSync.message.message: This bookmark is NOT meant to be opened, but to be synchronized using a service such as Weave or the XMarks extension.

extensionContributors.tip.message: Xente á que lle debes agradecer esta extensión

extensionCreator.tip.message: Visitar a páxina web do autor

extensionHomepage.tip.message: Visitar a páxina web da extensión

extensions.{73a6fe31-595d-460b-a920-fcc0.message: Extra protection for your Firefox: NoScript allows JavaScript, Java (and other plugins) only for trusted domains of your choice (e.g. your home-banking web site). This whitelist based pre-emptive blocking approach  prevents exploitation of security vulnerabilities (known and even unknown!) with no loss of functionality... Experts will agree: Firefox is really safer with NoScript :-)

global.warning.text.message:
Os scripts van ser permitidos de xeito global (para cada áxina web).
 Esta é unha acción potencialmente perigosa.
 Estás seguro de querer facelo?

informaction.tip.message: Visitar a páxina web de InformAction

license.tip.message: Ler a licenza de usuario final

logo.tip.message: Visitar a páxina web da extensión

metaRefresh.notify.message: NoScript blocou unha redirección <META> dentro dun elemento <NOSCRIPT>: $1 en $2 segundos.

reset.warning.message:
ALL the NoScript preferences and site permissions will be reset to their default values immediately.
This action cannot be reverted.
Do you want to continue?

sponsor.tip.message: Visitar a páxina web do patrocinador

unsafeReload.warning.message:
UNSAFELY reloading a suspicious

$1 [$2]

FROM [$3]

NoScript will NOT protect this request!

xss.notify.generic.message: NoScript filtrou un intento potencias de cross-site scripting (XSS) dende $1. Os detalles técnicos foron almacenados na consola.

xss.reason.filterXGet.message: Sanitized suspicious request. Original URL [$1] requested from [$2]. Sanitized URL: [$3].)

xss.reason.filterXGetRef.message: Sanitized suspicious request referer. URL [$1] requested from [$2]. Sanitized Referrer: [$3].)

xss.reason.filterXPost.message: Sanitized suspicious upload to [$1] from [$2]: transformed into a download-only GET request.
